
{{Server client function}}
This function allows restoring of all world objects,which were removed with [[/RemoveWorldModel.md|RemoveWorldModel]].

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool restoreAllWorldModels ( )
</syntaxhighlight>

==Returns==
Returns ''true'' if the world objects were restored, ''false'' otherwise.

==Requirements==
{{Requirements|1.2.0-9.03618|1.2.0-9.03618|}}

==Example==
This example adds command ''"restoreallworldobjects"'' that restores all world objects.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addCommandHandler("restoreallworldobjects",
  function()
    restoreAllWorldModels()
  end
)
</syntaxhighlight>
